creator: f.fumi@tiscali.it
text:
Applying the deleteSheet() to last sheet in a workbook makes the generated xls 
file unreadable by Excel (version 9.0.3821), running on a Win 2K system.
A fatal error makes Excel close immediatly after opening the file.
Note - Opening the same file using Excel (ver 10.4524) on Win Xp gives no 
problems.

Created attachment 9625
This is an example of the generated xls file with the error
creator: f.fumi@tiscali.it
